unnormalised: Boro, tumchea divorce zal'lean tumi vetat? Tem tanktik, mhaka khobor asa. Bhartantolem kutumb niyam ek bhoolbhulai bhaxen dista, khas korun bhavnancho provah chalu asa tedna. Ami kaim vostunche vixexi uloupak zai, ho? Hem niyamachi sal'la nhoi, tor tumkam suruvat korunkodden kaim ixttagatichi mahiti. Adv. Sharmaak bhett divche adim chai ani chit-chat mhunn dharo.
normalised: Boro, tumchea divorce zata mhunn? Tem kothin, maka khobor asa. Bharotantlea kutumb nikai karbharacho rosto chukunchea mazhea bhaxen disonk xakta, khas korun bhavnam unch astana. Thoddea vostunchea vixoyar ulo maruya, hã? Hem nikai karbharacho updesh nhoi, tuka survat korpak thodi itihasik mahiti. Tuka chai ani chit-chat mhunn chint, advocate Sharma-k mellche adim.

unnormalised: Poilem, Hindu Marriage Act, 1955, Muslim Women (Protection of Rights on Divorce) Act, 1986, ani Special Marriage Act, 1954 asa. Tumcher kontem lagu zata tem tumchea dhormacher ani tumi koxe lagin zaale tantun asata, boro? Disti disot, punn mhojem xvas dharo, zaitench lokh bhonvrak poddta. Tumchem kortt lagin Delhiant zal'lem aslear, SMA zait. Hem zannun astana tumchea vakilak ek head start mellta!
normalised: Poilem, hindu lagin kaido, ek hozar noxim ani pon'nas panch, muslim bailo (divorce-achea hakkanchem rakhonn) kaido, ek hozar noxim ani ekti assik, ani khas lagin kaido, ek hozar noxim ani pon'nas char. Tumche dhaorm ani tumche lagin koxe zale tea aadharar koso lagun asta, sory? Disonk saral, punn maka viswas dorya, zaite lok bhoklal zatat. Zori Delhi-n tumchea court lagin asle, tor sambhavtah S-M-A. Hem zonun tumchea vakilachea kamak survat milta!

unnormalised: Ani alimony-chi mukhy vishoy asa. Bailek kitle melltol? Purtumonx kitle bhortek xokta? Hanga vostu moddta. Kaim kortts ek lump sum nirnaya ditat - mhunlear, ₹20,00,000 - ani her manse monthly payments ditat, zait Rs. 25,000/- pro mahina. He soglle purtumonxache kamaik ani bailechi kamaichi takot (vo kamaik nasop) ani lagin kitle divos zalo tantun asti. BTW, korts purtumonxachi 1/3rd net income alimony-k dharun nirnaya ditat.
normalised: Ani alimony-cho poristhiti asa. Bailak kitle miltelet? Patik kitli denyak samporn zata? Hea vostunchea khatir samasya vadtat. Thoddea court-am ek sath rupia-k hukum kartat – mhunnche, rupia viss lakh – zalear dusream moinyachea denyak vartat, sambhavtah rupia pon'nas hazar dar mhoino. Hem sobar karannam-nche aadharar dharun asa, jeo pati-nchi aai, bailanchi kamayechi gunntavan (vo kamayechi kamtarayi), ani lagin-cho vell. Khobor assak, court-am pati-che netto ayacho ek tratiyak alimony-k zai mhunn vichear kartat.

unnormalised: Balokanchi zabadari ek mukhy vishoy. Konnak balok melltol? Sodanch, aai mukhy zabadari gheta, khas korun balok lhan aslear. Punn purtumonxak bhett divpachi permission asta, sodanch weekends vo suttik poddta. Mhunlear, sodanch 2nd & 4th Saturday. Kortts balokanchi uttam zata te dista. Hangachim shabdik vostu tanktik zaunk xakta; "guardian of the person" ani "guardian of the property" sarkhi shabdik vostu sodanch vaprun asta.
normalised: Bala-nchi rakhonn ek mhotti vast asa. Konn balak gheta? Sambhavtah, amyak prathamik rakhonn milta, khas korun balakan dhaktto astana. Pun pun patik poriyatancho hak milta, sambhavtah aitar vo sutti astana. Mhunnche, har dusrem ani chavtem satar. Court-am balakan khatir sarvuttam dharun asta, tuka dista. Hea nikai jargan zadda zata; vochondarya mhunnche "vyakti-ncho rakhonn" ani "samptincho rakhonn" sarkhe sadharan asat.

unnormalised: Ani ghorache vixexi? Kontem ravunk melltol? Tem joint asliar, kortt vikat gheunk ani taka vaito korun vantte korunk sangta. Tem purtumonxache nanvacher asliar, bailek novi ravpachi zaga sodunk poddtoli, kortt veglle nirnaya dilea virena, zait tem medical vo welfare karnank. Property vantte sodanch tanktik vishoy asta, ani zaitench uloupak lagtat, mhunlear, >5, eka samanjasyant yetle poddon.
normalised: Ani gharak kitem zata? Konn-ak ravpak milta? Zori tem ekatra malakich asa, court hem vechkpak hukum kartat ani praptik vibhagtat. Zori tem patinchean aslem, amyak ravpak ek novi zago sodpak podta, zori court-ak dusrem hukum nhoi aslem, sambhavtah vordik vo bholaikecha karanancha khatir. Sampti-nchi vibhagni zaite dukhkachi vast asa, ani hem sadharan zaitim sunneam gheta, mhunnche, panch-che poros vaddon, zoso ek tharau milta.

unnormalised: Uddapi ghaltat, eka prokruti veglle asa. Priyachi divorce Mumbaichem Rakeshaachem Bangalorent kamak yetam mhunn na. Online vaprum naka, hanv zaiten sangta! Vyavsaiyik sal'la ghea. Ek boro kutumb vakil sodun kaka, Adv. boro konnak. 10+ vorsanchi anubhav asle vakilank dhyaan dhiyat, khas korun balok aslear.
normalised: Uzvadd dakha, har poristhiti ek unik assa. Priyancho divorce Mumbai-n kamak ailo, to Rakeshancho Bangalore-n kamak na yevonk xakta. Tumchea online vachun poddta tancher samkhyen viswas na darat, heacho samil asun! Vyavasayik updesh milvoyat. Ek boro kutumb vakil milvoyat, advocate konn boro. Vakilank dakhoyat tankam dha vorsa poros vadd anubhav asa, khas korun balak samil aslyar.

unnormalised: Xevttim, tumchea dekhrek dhiyat. Divorce bhavnan tanktik. Tumchea ixttan ani kutumbant ubho ravat, ek therapist bheta tumkam zai zalear. Tem tanktik vel asa, punn tumi tache udexim vat sodun kaddtat. Bori bhog, ani chai peete rahiye! Tumkam tem lagtol.
normalised: Nomanak, tumchea bhavanche dhayan dorya. Divorce bhavnanch dukh assa. Tumchea ixttam ani kutumbachem aadhar gheiyat, zori tumkak zai tor therapist-ak mellat. To ek dhakto vell asa, punn tum zitin. Shubecha, ani chai peete rahiye! Tumkak tachi garaz poddteli.
